facet_1.name: Go Nuts
facet_1.effects: Scurry grants both bonus cast range and bonus attack range upon cast. Increases buff duration.

facet_2.name: Hipshot
facet_2.effects: Sharpshooter has a greatly reduced cooldown. Damage, debuff duration, turn rate penalty, and wind-up times are also reduced.

effects: Turns invisible instantaneously while increasing her movement speed
Creates a Decoy-based illusion that starts winding up Sharpshooter at the nearest enemy hero
If the Decoy-based illusion is attacked or hit by a unit-targeted ability, it is destroyed and throws a lesser Bushwhack toward the enemy
Tosses a boomerang in an arc that deals damage as it pass through enemy units

level_20: Sharpshooter Grants Vision and True Sight During Wind-up

abilities.name: Mistwoods Wayfarer
abilities.description: Has a chance to redirect incoming attacks to a nearby tree, destroying it in the process. The tree search radius is centered around Hoodwink.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Sharpshooter. Uses pseudo-random distribution.

abilities.name: Armor Corruption
abilities.description: Granted by learning a talent. Hoodwink's attacks now reduce the affected target's armor by a certain amount.
abilities.details: Applies the debuff per successful attack on the affected unit. Stacks independently with other Armor Corruption or armor reduction sources.

ability_1.name: Acorn Shot
ability_1.details: Fires an acorn attack on the target enemy. The acorn bounces to nearby targets, slowing them and dealing a percentage of Hoodwink's attack with bonus damage.
ability_1.description: Fires an acorn attack on the target enemy. The acorn bounces to nearby targets, slowing them and dealing a percentage of Hoodwink's attack with bonus damage.

facet_effects.go_nuts: Affected by Scurry's active bonus attack range, but not the bonus cast range

interaction_notes: Alt-Cast creates a planted tree at the targeted location
Acorn Shot will bounce to nearby target within the planted tree radius
Can bounce on the same enemy unit, after another enemy unit was hit between bounces

ability_2.name: Bushwhack
ability_2.details: Tosses a net trap that stuns enemy heroes if they are near a tree in the area. Affected enemies take damage over time.
ability_2.description: Tosses a net trap that stuns enemy heroes if they are near a tree in the area. Affected enemies take damage over time.
interaction_notes: Units trapped within the radius are pulled towards the tree nearest to them
Have their vision reduced to nil for its duration
Grants flying vision centered around the affected tree

ability_3.name: Scurry
ability_3.details: When activated, Hoodwink gains bonus movement speed, evasion, attack and cast range, phased movement, and tree-walking for a brief time.
ability_3.description: When activated, Hoodwink gains bonus movement speed, evasion, attack and cast range, phased movement, and tree-walking for a brief time.

facet_effects.go_nuts: Grants both bonus cast range and bonus attack range upon cast. Cast Range Bonus: 75/150/225/300, Attack Range Bonus: 75/150/225/300

interaction_notes: When Hoodwink is near trees, she can move through trees
Grants 2 charges immediately upon learning the ability
Cannot recast the ability until the current Scurry cast finishes

ability_4.name: Sharpshooter
ability_4.details: Charges up and fires a deadly bolt from her crossbow. After winding up for a while, the bolt is fired automatically and Hoodwink is knocked back for a distance from the force of the shot.
ability_4.description: Charges up and fires a deadly bolt from her crossbow. After winding up for a while, the bolt is fired automatically and Hoodwink is knocked back for a distance from the force of the shot.

facet_effects.hipshot: Max Wind-Up Time: 2.25, Max Damage: 450/731.25/1012.5, Max Debuff Duration: 3.75, Set Turn Rate during Wind-Up: 90Â°, Cooldown: 22.5

interaction_notes: Disarms and limits Hoodwink's turn rate while winding-up
The damage, movement speed slow, and break duration applied on the affected enemy hero scale up to the max values based on the wind-up time
The bolt flies through creeps and damages them, albeit the damage being less effective

changes: Reduced Acorn Shot mana cost from 85/90/95/100 to 70/80/90/100
Scurry: Increased buff duration from 2/2.5/3/3.5 to 3.5/4/4.5/5
Go Nuts no longer increases buff duration by 1.5
Increased Acorn Shot instant attack damage bonus from 40/80/120/160 to 45/90/135/180
Increased Sharpshooter max damage from 550/900/1250 to 600/975/1350
Hunter's Boomerang: Increased movement speed slow from 20% to 25%
Hunter's Boomerang: Increased spell damage amplification from 20% to 25%
Rescaled Bushwhack cooldown from 14 on each level to 15/14/13/12
